attributes.action: Remove all prescription charges for those suffering with Cancer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cancer drugs are essential to increase survival time and improve the quality of life of those inflicted with this disease.  Contraception to prevent life is available on the NHS without prescription charge; surely maintaining life is, at minimum, an equally important cause and worthy of financial support.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
